column4: can someone point me in the right direction as far as setting up software raid goes?
there's a great tutorial at tldp.org
i've used it to set up software raid 1 on slackware
I can do this after I've installed the OS right? (the boot volume won't be in the raid)
do you happen to know, if I set up a 2 drive array w/ software raid, and someday I switch to hardware, is that possible, or do they work completely differently
not sure about that.  it would probably depend on the card
but under software raid, each disk is identical -- take one away and mount it normally, it'll work fine
can I set up the raid after one disk already has data on it?
just be sure which drive is used to build the raid from
because it's possible to synch the blank drive to the full drive
